reuters.title: ERC INTERNATIONAL <ERC> TO OFFER DEBENTURES
reuters.body: ERC International said it will file in the first quarter for a public offering of 25 mln dlrs principal amount convertible subordinated debentures due 2012. It said it will file a registration statement with the Securities and Exchange Commission. Proceeds will be used to repay existing debt, with the balance to be used in its acquisition program and for additional working capital, the company said. Reuter 
